name: Bull Beat
description:
A spiritual successor to Donkey Kong Jungle Beat staring an angry bull!
Jump and Run your way through the sky fortress while taking down enemies and obstacles in your way to face the final boss in a brawl.

This game can be played with a keyboard, but it was made with the DK Bongos in mind.

These can be connected to the PC through some trickery if you have the Gamecube to Wii U adapter or a similar device.

When using JoyToKey set up the left bongo to act as the left arrow key, the right bongo to act as the right arrow key and the clap sensor to act as the space bar.

The method and tools I used are described here:
http://m4sv.com/page/wii-u-gcn-usb-driver

This is a proof of concept rather than a full game and only has one level with a boss fight.

Created with Unreal Engine 5
